node.name: codeBeamer Plugin for Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
codeBeamer is a Collaborative Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) Solution for distributed software development.

codeBeamer provides project management, wiki, document management, issue tracking, configuration management (ITIL), continuous integration, version control, source code analysis and forums through a single and secure environment.

This plugin integrates codeBeamer features with the Eclipse.
node.body:
codeBeamer is a Collaborative Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) Solution for distributed software development.

codeBeamer provides project management, wiki, document management, issue tracking, configuration management (ITIL), continuous integration, version control, source code analysis and forums through a single and secure environment.

This plugin integrates codeBeamer features with the Eclipse.
